(Program 
  (Statement 
    (MethodCall 
      (Block 
        (BlockParameters 
          (Identifier "x")) 
        (Statement 
          (Binary 
            (Token) 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Lhs 
                  (Variable 
                    (Identifier "x"))))) 
            (Arg 
              (Primary 
                (Integer "1")))))) 
      (Variable 
        (Identifier "lambda")))))
